column14: She smiled at me on the subway.
column15: 因为她曾在地铁上对我微笑。
column17: 虽然她身边有另一个人。
column18: But I won't lose no sleep on that
column20: 但我可不会为此辗转难眠 ，
column29: 你就是这么的美 ，千真万确 。
column30: I saw your face in a crowded place
column32: 我曾在茫茫人海中瞥见你的脸，
column33: And I don't know what to do
column37: 因为 我永远无法伴你左右。
column46: 在我们擦身而过的瞬间，
column47: She could see from my face that I was
column49: 她可以从我的脸上看出，
column53: And I don't think that I'll see her again
column57: But we shared a moment that will last till the end.
column58: 但我们共享了那永恒的片刻。
column65: 你就是这么的美 ，千真万确 。
column66: I saw your face in a crowded place
column68: 我曾在人潮拥挤之处瞥见你的脸
column70: And I don't know what to do
column74: 因为 我永远无法伴你左右。
column83: 你就是这么的美 ，千真万确 。
column84: There must be an angel with a smile on her face
column86: 她的面容如同一位微笑着的天使，
column87: When she thought up that I should be with you.
column88: 当她想起我应该陪在她身旁的时候，
column89: But it's time to face the truth
column91: 却是该面对现实的时候了，
column92: I will never be with you.
